item.description:
Join CT Theatre Group for a night of fun, friends, and great Theatre!

Isn’t It Romantic at the Park Road Playhouse in West Harford
Winner of Hartford Magazine Best Of 2008 Award!

“…a nouvelle cuisine comedy.” – NY Times

Friday, November 21 at 7:30pm

Tickets are $30

ONLINE SPECIAL - 2 Tickets for only $50 Click Here

UPDATE: The CT Theatre Group will meet for drinks and conversation before the show from 6:30 to 7:15 pm at:

Cheng Du Cuisine of China
179 Park Rd
West Hartford, CT 06119
(860) 232-6455

Look for the CT Theatre Group signs.

From I-84, east or west, take Exit 43. At the end of the ramp, turn right. Park Road Playhouse is approximately one half mile on the left. Cheng Du Cuisine is 2 blocks past the Playhouse on the Right.

Tickets at the event are $35, or get your tickets online for only $30

For Questions, call (860) 436-9449

See You At The Show!

This event will sell out fast, so get your ticket today!

Meet the CT Theatre Group in the lobby before the show

Post-college careers (and dilemmas) of two former classmates, a slightly plump would-be writer named Janie Blumberg, and her tall, thin gorgeous WASP friend, Harriet Cornwall. Both are struggling to escape from lingering parental domination and to establish their own lives and identities.

In Janie's case this leads to an inconclusive involvement with a young Jewish doctor who calls her "Monkey"; while Harriet assails the world of big business and has an affair with her hard-driving (and married) boss.

Told in a fast-moving series of inventive, alternately hilarious and touchingly revealing scenes, the play explores their parallel stories with uncommon wit and wisdom—resulting, ultimately, in a heightened awareness which, while not providing all the answers, goes a long way toward achieving the maturity and self-assuredness that both protagonists so desperately desire.

Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or your tickets today!

item.name: Join the CT Theatre Group for "Isn't It Romantic" at The Park Road Playhouse
